channel.title: CVE Feed for supsysticcom -- Easy Google Maps
channel.description: The latest CVEs for supsysticcom -- Easy Google Maps

item.title: CVE-2023-2526|2024-08-02T06:26:09.693Z -- supsysticcom -- easy%20google%20maps
item.description: The Easy Google Maps plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Cross-Site Request Forgery in versions up to, and including, 1.11.7. This is due to missing or incorrect nonce validation on the AJAX action handler. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to executes AJAX actions via a forged request granted they can trick a site administrator into performing an action such as clicking on a link.

item.title: CVE-2024-5219|2024-07-02T15:08:53.234Z -- supsysticcom -- easy%20google%20maps
item.description: The Easy Google Maps plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the plugin's file upload feature in all versions up to, and including, 1.11.15 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with Author-level access and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.

item.description: The Easy Google Maps plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the plugin's file upload feature in all versions up to, and including, 1.11.15 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping.
